item.title: Schedule
item.description: Find all assignments and due dates here. This schedule updates frequently. Week Date Topic Prepare AE Lab Exam Project 1 Mon Jun 27 Intro to R ae 1 Tue Jun 28 Visualization I lab 1 Thu Jun 30 Visualization II lab 2 2 Mon Jul 04 NO CLASS: Independence Day Tue Jul 05 Simple Linear Regression lab 3 Thu Jul 07 Multiple linear regression No lab: exam released exam 1 3 Mon Jul 11 Multiple linear regression II exam 1 due Tue Jul 12 Logistic regression Regression project: workday Thu Jul 14 Random variables + distributions lab 4 4 Mon Jul 18 Simulation-based inference I Tue Jul 19 Simulation-based inference II lab 5 Thu Jul 21 Hypothesis testing I No lab: exam released exam 2 5 Mon Jul 25 Hypothesis testing II exam 2 due Tue Jul 26 Central Limit Theorem (CLT) lab 6 Thu Jul 28 Regression + inference Final project: peer-review 6 Mon Aug 01 Data science ethics Tue Aug 02 Special topic: xaringan lab 7 Thu Aug 04 Special topic: Cryptanalysis Final project: workday
